contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Judgment and Order of the Superior Court, 352 Pa.Super. 621, 505 A.2d 1038, reversing the Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Delaware County granting Appellants’ motion for compulsory nonsuit is hereby reversed. See Pa.R.C.P. 227.1(b); Estep v. Estep, 508 Pa. 623, 500 A.2d 418 (1985).
